prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
ABDUL AFEEF N
Full Stack Dotnet Developer
Contact : +91 9496327181
Email : mail.abdulafeef@gmail.com
Address : Kerala, India
A technically savvy dotnet developer, with 7+ years of dotnet application development expertise. Possess a
strong driving force for improving the performance, scalability and reliability of development projects. Has a long
track record of creating dynamic, rich and interesting dotnet applications, and of providing long term solutions.
Possess rich experience of completing challenging client projects. A self-directed and self-managed person.
Currently looking for a suitable full stack dotnet and angular developer position and to join an enthusiastic team.
Key Skills
● Solid experience in .NET 6, ASP.Net Core, C#, .NET 6 WebApi
● Good knowledge in using SQL Server
● Experience in building Single-page client application using Angular 15
● Experience in building Mobile application using Flutter
● Experienced in using object-oriented principles to ensure a scalable and reusable architecture
Software
● Languages/Scripts : C#, .NET 6, .NET Core, .NET 6 Web API, Angular 15, Flutter
● Databases : SQL Server
● Technologies : Linq to SQL, ADO.NET, EF6
Occupational Contour
● Full Stack Dotnet Developer, Ministry of Interior, Muscat, Oman - June 2022 – January 2024
Responsible to build applications using .NET 6 WebApi, Sql Server and Angular 15 technologies
● Full Stack Software Developer, Freelance - February 2021 – May 2022
Responsible to build web, mobile applications using .NET 6 WebApi, Angular 13 and flutter 3.0 technologies
● Dotnet Developer, Skyislimit Technologies Pvt. Ltd, Kerala, India - March 2019 – January 2021
Responsible to build web and desktop applications using asp.net Web API and Winform technologies
● Dotnet Developer, Azinova Technologies LLC, Dubai, UAE - December 2016 – November 2018
Responsible to build web and desktop applications using asp.net Web API and Winform technologies
● Dotnet Developer, Lakshyaleader Education Software P
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
